name: Poster Presentation
details: A visual presentation that summarizes research findings or academic work using graphics, charts, and brief text explanations.

name: Case Study
details: An in-depth analysis of a real-life scenario or problem, focusing on practical application of theoretical knowledge.

name: Term Paper
details: A research-based academic paper written by students over an academic term, typically analyzing a specific topic in detail.

name: Thesis Writing
details: A comprehensive research document submitted in support of a candidate’s academic degree, presenting original research and findings.

name: Research Writing
details: A systematic process of investigating a topic, collecting data, analyzing information, and presenting results in an academic format.

name: Internship Report
details: A detailed report summarizing the learning experiences, tasks, and outcomes of a student’s internship at an organization.
